name: Harness of the Goblet
blurb: An H-shaped harness worn across the chest and body, etched with images of women holding goblets raised to the sky.
desc: Equipment: Middle slot. Gains a charge after every fight, and for every 5 nodes walked. Spend 6 charges for a cleansing effect on yourself, 9 for a cleanse on someone else, and 12 to suppress effects of a random bane you have. Lower amounts/remainder are spent for morale restoration.
